fields.description: When changing a label from fontWeight normal to fontWeight bold the text sometimes becomes prematurely ellipsed.  To recreate, run the attached project and click the 'Locations' label.  The text becomes ellipsed despite having room to grow.  Clicking another label changes the text back to normal and no longer ellipses.  This appears to only be an issue on iOS.  Android does not prematurely ellipse.
fields.summary: iOS: text being ellipsized early when going from normal weight to bold
fields.environment:
MacOS 10.13.4
Xcode 9.3
Titanium SDK 7.1.0.GA
iPhone 8 simulator iOS 11.3

comments.body: This seems to be a duplicate of TIMOB-16511 which has a fix ready and is scheduled for 7.3.0.
